items.sentence: I'm glad that you were able to be with your parents on Christmas Day.
I think that it wouldn't have happened if Tom had been there with us.
I want to take advantage of the opportunity to speak to the governor.
I won't have to rent skis this year because Tom gave me his old pair.
The train was so packed that I had to stand up during the whole trip.
I'd never say it this way, but I can understand the intended meaning.
I asked Tom to clean his room yesterday, and he still hasn't done it.
I've been back home for a week, but I'm still suffering from jet lag.
Most people who have spoken to Tom would say that he's very outgoing.
At first, I'd planned to do it that way, but I later changed my mind.
